AnalysisModule.Description: Calculate pixel statistics for each XY plane. Produced from XML specification.

Table.Description: General image XY slice attributes. Produced from XML.

Column.Description: X cooridinate of plane centroid calculated by intensity
Y cooridinate of plane centroid calculated by intensity

SemanticType.Name: XYPlaneMin
SemanticType.Description: Minimum pixel intensity in an XY plane

SemanticElement.Name: Min
SemanticElement.Description: Minimum pixel intensity

SemanticElement.Name: theZ
SemanticElement.Description: Z index describing the XY Plane

SemanticElement.Name: theW
SemanticElement.Description: Wavenumber index describing the XY Plane

SemanticElement.Name: theT
SemanticElement.Description: Timepoint index describing the XY Plane

SemanticType.Name: XYPlaneMax
SemanticType.Description: Maximum pixel intensity in an XY plane

SemanticElement.Name: Max
SemanticElement.Description: Maximum pixel intensity

SemanticElement.Name: theZ
SemanticElement.Description: Z index

SemanticElement.Name: theW
SemanticElement.Description: Wavenumber index describing the XY Plane

SemanticElement.Name: theT
SemanticElement.Description: Timepoint index describing the XY Plane

SemanticType.Name: XYPlaneMean
SemanticType.Description: Mean of pixel intensities in an XY plane

SemanticElement.Description: Mean of pixel intensities

SemanticElement.Description: Z index

SemanticElement.Name: theW
SemanticElement.Description: Wavenumber index describing the XY Plane

SemanticElement.Name: theT
SemanticElement.Description: Timepoint index describing the XY Plane

SemanticType.Description: Standard deviation of pixel intensities in an XY plane

SemanticElement.Description: Standard Deviation of pixel intensities

SemanticElement.Description: Z index

SemanticType.Description: x coordinate in pixels of center of pixel intensity for the plane
